biblStruct.note: Article is devoted to analyze of fragment of the text of Procopius of Caesarea in which the historian reports about the testament of the emperor Arcadius. The author of article shows that Procopius has inattentively treated the source and has recreated modern to him realities in the past. In fact the events connected with the episode described by Procopius took place with the mediation of the bishop of the city of Maipherkat Marutha.
